thread.title: Blue Jays Fans Petition to Have Rogers Centre Roof Open for Game 5
thread.title_full: Blue Jays Fans Petition to Have Rogers Centre Roof Open for Game 5

author: Jeanette Torres
title: Blue Jays Fans Petition to Have Rogers Centre Roof Open for Game 5
text:
Share Article 
Brad White/Getty Images (TORONTO) -- Toronto Blue Jays fans are petitioning to have the dome of the Rogers Centre open on Wednesday when the team goes up against the Texas Rangers in Game 5 of the American League Division Series.The creator of the Change.org petition notes that the Blue Jays have a better record at home when the stadium's roof is retracted. And being that Game 5 is an elimination game, the creator argues that Toronto can use all the help it can get."In 2015's regular season, the Blue Jays won 38 times and lost 14 when the dome was open," the petition reads. "When it was closed, they won 11 and lost 14. Let's give them all the support we can and get the dome opened up for Wednesday!"So far, the petition has over 22,000 signatures. It is directed at MLB Commissioner Rob Manfred, since the league has the final say on whether or not the roof will be opened.Game 5 is scheduled to start at 4 p.m.
